packages.name: Weatherstation weather driver
packages.description: This is a driver for the free weatherstack API. They provide 1,000 free calls per month so you can run an hourly refresh rate. It also calculates luminance seperately and can undate this more frequently.

packages.name: Rainbird sprinkler controller driver
packages.description: Driver for Rainbird sprinkler wifi controller

packages.name: Mysa Thermostat Integration
packages.description: Integrates Mysa smart thermostats with Hubitat via real-time MQTT. Supports V1, V2, V2 Lite, and In-Floor models.

packages.name: Saunabox Driver
packages.description: A Hubitat Elevation driver for controlling and monitoring Blebox SaunaBox devices. Provides full thermostat integration, automatic safety shutoff, and intelligent polling.

packages.name: Home Connect Integration V3
packages.description: Integration for Home Connect appliances (Bosch, Thermador, Siemens, Gaggenau, and Neff). A complete rewrite with enhanced reliability and features.
